extendedInfo.description: Chicken Tic-Tac-Toe! is a free Tic Tac Toe game for the Android where you can either play singelplayer against the Chicken, challenge a friend using bluetooth or hot-seat, or go online and compete for the top spots on the Leaderboards!The game includes 58 achievements, most of which are initially secret achievements and will have to be found either though normal game play and by exploring the app.Do you have what it takes to beat the Chicken? Enjoy the classic game of Tic-Tac-Toe in singleplayer mode, against a friend or online!Features- Singleplayer mode- Multiplayer Hot seat mode (two players / one phone)- Multiplayer Bluetooth- Multiplayer Online [Require Android 2.2+]- Multiple game board sizes (3x3, 5x5, 7x7, 10x10)- Full OpenFeint integration for Achievements, Leaderboards and Avatars.- Over 55 Achievements- Online Leaderboards- Simple in-game chat- Completely free to download and playMeet the Chicken on Twitter http://twitter.com/#!/ChickenTacToeUser feedback:- "Really really good designed Tic Tac Toe game! Many achievements, different mode and online and Bluetooth! No FC, no lag, 5stars no doubt! HTC desire" 5/5 (Boda)- "Haha what an ridiculous game. I recommend it" 5/5 (Emilie)- "Great Family game! Cute music!"
